column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Lin says : " Su , what are you doing home ? "
#Text=Suyin says : " Wow , you almost look like a real cop ! "
#Text=Lin says : " You 're supposed to be in school . "
#Text=Suyin says : " Oh no , are you going to tell Mom ?
#Text=" Boy says : " Oh , it fell off the back of a truck .
#Text=" Lin says : " What are you doing hanging out with these losers ?
#Text=" Suyin says : " They 're my friends and you have no right to call them that !
#Text=Come on guys , let 's get out of here .
#Text=" Lin says : " Su , stop .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Get your hands off of me !
#Text=" Lin says : " You have so much potential .
#Text=You 're ruining your life !
#Text=" Suyin says : " At least I have a life !
#Text=" Suyin says : " These meteorites are perfect for beginning metalbenders .
#Text=The metals have a unique property , making them easier to bend .
#Text=" Korra says : " That 's amazing !
#Text=" Suyin says : " Here , try it !
#Text=" Korra says : " Okay .
#Text=" Korra says : " Bolin ?
#Text=Is that you ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " No !
#Text=" Korra says : " What are you doing ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh , hey ladies .
#Text=Just uh ... I was just looking for Pabu .
#Text=Pabu !
#Text=" Korra says : " He 's on your shoulder .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh , look there you are !
#Text=You know , I thought something was chewing on my ear .
#Text=Probably need to get a shot .
#Text=Pabu has sort of a ... a venom .
#Text=Anyways , so what are you guys doing ?
#Text=You metalbending over here or something ?
#Text=" Suyin says : " Want to give it a shot ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Nah , it 's okay .
#Text=I mean , only like one earthbender in a hundred can metalbend .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Well , do n't believe everything you hear .
#Text=The only thing limiting you is your attitude .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Well , maybe I 'll just ... I 'll just stay and watch .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Try to focus on the fine pieces of earth within the metal .
#Text=" Korra says : " I ca n't believe it !
#Text=I 'm metalbending !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Wow , you picked that up really , really quick .
#Text=Guess you 're that one in a hundred .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Great job , Korra .
#Text=" Radio says : " Calling all units .
#Text=Property reported on the corner of 5th and Harbor .
#Text=Suspect 's vehicle headed south on Hallow Boulevard .
#Text=Units responding , identify .
#Text=" Lin says : " Unit three responding .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Leave them alone !
#Text=" Lin says : " Su ?
#Text="
